name: Memories Alive
description:
Mortals will forget, but what do we want to keep alive?

This time, we came back with a fascinating text adventure game. We also had a brand new team member who provided beautiful music. Hope all of you could enjoy the suspense but warm story.

Credits:

Programming: Vilja
Story: Daviscartes
Graphics: Unknown_XYZ
Music: Noda Jam

Made with [Ren'Py](https://www.renpy.org).
